title: Galentine's Special Party Games
p: You are hosting the Galentine's party and feeling overwhelmed with the day's planning? No worries, I've got your back hehe. Here are some party games that you can use as time fillers and as a away of bonding even more with your friends ⋆ ˚｡⋆୨୧˚
list: Never Have I Ever -- Share fun and lighthearted revelations
2-Truths & 1-Lie -- Guess the lies in a playful guessing game
Friendship Trivia -- See who knows the most about each other
Card Games -- Fun classics like Uno or Crazy Eights
Murder Mystery Game -- Solve a thrilling case together
Would You Rather? -- Pose hilarious and crazy choices
